items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cocktail dress
items.body: I felt comfortable and confident wearing this dress and received many compliments. Read more
items.author: Dana M. Bobinchek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like it
items.body: True to size and very nice! It is lined, too Read more
items.author: Patty Texeira

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars it's ok
items.body: It's ok- I didn't love the fabric and wasn't the quality I needed for my event Read more
items.author: bluiis1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: This dress is perfect! Exactly what I expected. The material is nice and the dress flows nicely. Classy and flattering. Read more
items.author: Nate Thomas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very tight on larger busts. Size up!
items.body: I haven't worn it out yet, so I'm not entirely sure, but when trying it on, it is very tight in the chest. If I am retaining the smallest amount of water, I won't be able to wear this to our holiday party. That being said, it seems fairly decent otherwise. Not the best, but not the worst. The fabric isn't soft at all. The color is nice. Read more
items.author: Beth W

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The materials and just fit me like it was custom made for me .
items.author: MERLYN RAIFORD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for the cost
items.body: This dress is a great color, very flattering, and very comfortable. My only *complaint* if you could even call it that, is that you can notice/feel how synthetic the fabric is. On looks alone- it’s very chic- 10/10. However, if someone felt the fabric, they’d know it’s not great quality. Read more
items.author: mjk10487

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fits small
items.body: I really liked the dress, but it was way too small. I usually wear an XL, and that's what I ordered. It was too small. It was closer to a M/L. Read more
items.author: Eric Murine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Long Sleeve Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Long Sleeve Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Deep Green, Blue Green, Peacock Green, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
